Dominion [startdom]: 4

The Golden Idol is an ancient spirit bound to a statue of a golden calf. Millennia of worship and bloody sacrifices has made the Idol powerful and now with the Pantokrator gone, the spirit will claim dominion over the entire world and become the one True God.
